amendment.description: Amendment sought to ban soft money expenditures by a State, district, or local committee of a political party for Federal election activity.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 33 printed in the Congresional Record of February 12, 2002 to completely ban soft money, thereby not allowing its use by state parties for generic voter registration activities.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Emerson amendment (A012) Failed by recorded vote: 185 - 244 (Roll no. 29).
